subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: A rookie Tour reporter hooked up with a veteran to learn some of the ins and outs of covering an event that is fast-moving and spread out over dozens of miles.
snippet: A rookie Tour reporter hooked up with a veteran to learn some of the ins and outs of covering an event that is fast-moving and spread out over dozens of miles.
